column5: Today looked to good not to head out.28-30c and no wind.Plan was trout and walleye.Trout action was so good I never tried walleyes.Put a couple of dozen lakers in the boat between 9 and 1:30.Then got to hot out.Got them jigging tubes and trolling my dipsy diver in 50-60 ft.Nothing like catching trout.Kept a couple of small ones to eat.No one on the lake except me and a black bear.
I was there in camo you must not have seen me
Whenever I fish it's windy as hel n rainy n storming,are you sure you live in Ontario john?you better check your address
Iam just picking good days.Go out on deck in morning and checÄ· out weatherCheck weather station to.But I know what you mean though.When I guide I get into all kinds of weather.
Not only all kinds of weather,all kinds of people also
Looks like you had everything workin in your favor today,and if those free minnows were working as good as the weather,it's a ( jackpot day ) lol
I tip my tube jigs with a freebie minnow at all times.Proof is in the pudding.
